data.title: Betting on coins
data.statement:
You join your friends in a bar to have a drink with them. They are playing a betting game : they throw a coin [[n]] times and bet on the number of times they will get "tails".

We suppose that the coins are not loaded.

Each of your friends has chosen a number of "tails", and you wonder who has the highest probability to win...

Several friends might have the same probability  to win, so they will all be considered as "winners" if they were right ...

data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> [[n]], the number of throws
<<Line 2:>> [[friends]], the number of friends
<<[[friends]] following lines :>> a string [[friend]] (the name of the friend) and an integer [[k]] (the number of "tails" he chose), separated by a space
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> the name of the probable winners, separated by spaces (in the input’s order)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You join your friends in a bar to have a drink with them. They are playing a betting game : they throw a coin n times and bet on the number of times they will get "tails".

We suppose that the coins are not loaded.

Each of your friends has chosen a number of "tails", and you wonder who has the highest probability to win...

Several friends might have the same probability to win, so they will all be considered as "winners" if they were right ...
Input
Line 1 : n, the number of throws
Line 2: friends, the number of friends
friends following lines : a string friend (the name of the friend) and an integer k (the number of "tails" he chose), separated by a space
Output
Line 1: the name of the probable winners, separated by spaces (in the input’s order)
Constraints
0 < n <= 25
0<= k <= n
0 < friends <= 20
Example
Input
2
3
fred 1
george 0
alan 2
Output
fred
